I'm loving that aerospike
Does yours cockpits have SAS for purpose, becose stock cockpits doesn't have SAS.
The more I see of that aerospike, the more I love it. All my SSTOs are RAPIER-based at the moment, but I think a redesign might be in order given how it's looking.

Hi there, I love your future release, I want it to my tech tree, great work.

Anyway, do you think you can add this sort of things which make spaceplace more, beautiful shaped ? :

![nqtvt2O.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/nqtvt2O.jpg?1)

That's an interesting idea, I'll consider it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I can imagine making different variants of them that perform different tasks (i.e. intake, RCS, fuel, battery, etc).

Ow, it will be interesting with different configuration of course ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) i like how you designed your parts, very stock-a-like, You and SuicidalInsanity (mk2 expansion part) are making good work ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

How do I use the "Phoenix" VTOL Wing Section? I couldn't notice the difference between the hover mod On or Off. And using that little plane that came with the mod, the only thing that "hover height" did was flip my craft around.

> 
> How do I use the "Phoenix" VTOL Wing Section? I couldn't notice the difference between the hover mod On or Off. And using that little plane that came with the mod, the only thing that "hover height" did was flip my craft around.

I think I may remove the hover function in the next update until Firespitter.dll is fixed for it. The heat bug combined with not seeming to work seems more like a hassle at this point than a worthwhile feature.

To get the wing section to work place them in symmetry and whichever wing has the flag decal pointing towards the floor should be set to reverse thrust. Default thrust always points in the direction opposite the flag, or "up", side ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

> 
> How do I use the "Phoenix" VTOL Wing Section? I couldn't notice the difference between the hover mod On or Off. And using that little plane that came with the mod, the only thing that "hover height" did was flip my craft around.

Personally, I just throw a crapload of that jet-rcs stuff on, and then hover myself.
I would love to see some stock alike solar-panel wings added. I'm surprised how hard they are to find.

**Update to 1.2.7 is out!**

Adds:

*-Mk2 Linear Aerospike Rocket*

*-Mk2 Shielded Docking Nose*

*-Mk2-1 Slanted Adapter*

*-Mk2 Medium Nose Cone*

Nice!
Awesome! Can I ask about the "cylcone" lifter section, is there a way to shut the "fairings" round the engine when moving forward in flight?

> 
> Awesome! Can I ask about the "cylcone" lifter section, is there a way to shut the "fairings" round the engine when moving forward in flight?

The Cyclone animation is dependent on the engine state, so to close them you have to deactivate the engine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
